name: Rails Template
body:
### Bootstrap a New Application
This is a simple Ruby on Rails template to get you going with Devise/RSpec/Cucumber/HAML and the Twitter Bootstrap. It provides some useful defaults, helpers and sets you up for a quick Heroku deployment with Amazon S3 support as well. Here's how to use it:

```
$ rails new APP_NAME -T -d mysql -m https://github.com/tonycoco/rails_template/raw/master/rails_template.rb
```

Done. Let the app install and you have yourself a starter-kit for a new exciting application.

### Customization
Look for all instances of the string "CHANGEME" in the generated application and make sure you have the following setup on your system:

```
ENV['FACEBOOK_APP_ID']
ENV['FACEBOOK_APP_SECRET']
ENV['AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID']
ENV['AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY']
```

### Roll Your Own
Fork it. Use it. Make it your own. If you are customizing this template, you can use any methods provided by Thor::Actions and Rails::Generators::Actions

### Notes
This is not yet finished. There has been continuous development on it. I do keep the master branch always in a working state. I'm in the middle of adding tests to track the output of the template, but that may be overkill.
